resources.string: “People who love to eat are always the best people.”
“One cannot think well, love well, sleep well if one has not dined well.”
“Life is uncertain. Eat dessert first.”
“Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all”
“We all eat, and it would be a sad waste of opportunity to eat badly.”
“You don’t need a silver fork to eat good food.”
“There is no sincere love than the love of food..”
“Pull up a chair.Take a taste.Come join us.Life is so endlessly delicious.”
“A recipe has no soul. You, as the cook, must bring soul to the recipe.”
“Good food is the foundation of genuine happiness.”
“The only thing I like better than talking about food is eating.”
“Food is symbolic of love when words are inadequate.”
“You are what you eat, so don’t be fast, cheap, easy, or fake.”
“The secret of success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.”
“Laughter is brightest in the place where food is.”
“Happiness is homemade.”
“Food brings people together on many different levels. It’s nourishment of the soul and body; it’s truly love.”
“I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.”
“First, we eat. Then, we do everything else.”
“Cooking and eating is as timeless as a heartbeat.”
“There’s no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap.”
“In wine, there is wisdom. In beer, there is freedom. In water, there is bacteria.”
“You don’t have to cook fancy or complicated masterpieces – just good food from fresh ingredients.”
“Eat breakfast like a king, lunch like a prince, and dinner like a pauper.”
“I am not a glutton. I am an explorer of food.”
“Food is the ingredient that binds us together.”
“A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand.”
“Food is not rational. Food is culture, habit, craving, and identity.”
“The belly rules the mind.”
“Count the memories, not the calories.”
“Good food is all the sweeter when shared with good friends.”
“Love and sausage are alike. Can never have enough of either.”
“There’s nothing more romantic than Italian food.”
“All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast.”
“Food is fuel, but good food is soul fuel.”
“There is no love sincerer than the love of food.”
“Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.”
“Nothing brings people together like good food.”
“My weaknesses have always been food and men – in that order.”
“Eating is a necessity, but cooking is an art”
